description: Make this easy chicken salad in four simple steps using only four ingredients. This meal is ready in 15 minutes and perfect for a light yet filling dinner.
keywords: Chicken salad,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Spring,Oct 2020,Soy free,Wheat free,Apple,Kale,Leftover chicken,Chicken,Dinner Made Easy,Peanut free
name: Easy Chicken & Kaleslaw Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small Granny Smith apple, quartered, cored (thinly sliced)

recipeInstructions.text: Place chicken on a chopping board. Using a rolling pin, pound chicken to flatten slightly. Drizzle chicken with 2 tbs extra virgin olive oil and season.
Heat a greased chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Cook chicken for 4 minutes on each side or until cooked. Transfer to a plate. Cover with foil. Rest for 5 minutes.
Place kaleslaw, reserving dressing and seed mix, in a large bowl. Add apple and half the reserved dressing to kaleslaw. Toss to combine.
Slice chicken and arrange on kaleslaw mixture. Top with feta and reserved seed mix. Serve with remaining dressing.
